document.full_text: a year after hitting rock bottom in a royal favors scandal, the disgraced former daughter-in-law of britain's queen elizabeth says she is now debt-free and positive about the future.
document.title: sarah ferguson films return from "emotional bankruptcy"
lines_and_colors: a year after hitting rock bottom in a royal favors scandal, the disgraced former daughter-in-law of britain's queen elizabeth says she is now debt-free and positive about the future.
